channel.title: Aether Mod

item.title: Aether Mod
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

TabbyKiller:

Seen ParagonNova on this mod. Looks pretty cool, just needs more items and objectives

It’s actually a rather intricate mod to say it needs more. The fact he basically wrote his own version of Notch’s pseudo map generation to make it sky-looking is just amazing to me, as its a major engine fix.

@Topic - I tried this mod and grew a red/black Moa to play around with. Quite fun until you find out the hard way their flight is a tad limited

Read full topic
